title: Four Parts of the Universe
description: This edition is out of print.When Rain - a dreamy designer - buys an antique cross, she begins to see visions of her previous life in her lucid dreams. A series of accidental events begin to bring the people from her dreams into her real life: Charlie - a quirky girl from the pub, Matt - an aspiring rock star, and Ed - a jaded club owner. If there is something they all share - itâ€™s a burnt down mansion, a small ominous town, and a century-old legend about two crosses.
author: Polina Traore
